    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_c2970057dea68673cee812daf9580d93bcd9a2a5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_c2970057dea68673cee812daf9580d93bcd9a2a5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A hot air balloon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Heißluftballon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un ballon à air chaud</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um balão de ar quente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un aerostato di aria calda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα μπαλόνι καυτού αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un globo del aire caliente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of four illustrations showing the use of convection currents. This diagram shows a hot air balloon that rises up due to the heated air inside it.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot air balloon</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von vier Abbildungen, die den Gebrauch von
Konvektionströmen zeigen. Dieses Diagramm zeigt einen 
Heißluftballon, der Anstiege herauf wegen der lebhaften Luft 
innerhalb sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de quatre illustrations montrant 
l'utilisation des courants de convection. Ce diagramme montre un
ballon à air chaud qui des élévations vers le haut d'en raison de 
l'air de chauffage à l'intérieur de lui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de quatro ilustrações que mostram
o uso de correntes do convection. Este diagrama mostra um balão
de ar quente que ascensões acima de devido ao ar aquecido dentro 
dele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano l'uso delle correnti di convezione. Questo schema 
mostra un aerostato di aria calda che aumenti su dovuto l'aria 
riscaldata all'interno di esso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τη χρήση 
των ρευμάτων μεταφοράς. Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει 
μπαλόνι καυτού αέρα που ανέρχεται επάνω λόγω στο θερμαμένο 
αέρα μέσα σε το.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de cuatro ilustraciones que muestran el 
uso de las corrientes de la convección. Este diagrama muestra 
un globo del aire caliente que las subidas encima de  debido al aire 
calentado dentro de él.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heißluft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heißluftballon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la chaleur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">air chaud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ballon à air chaud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">aria calda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">aerostato di aria calda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">calor</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
